member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Controllers.HealthController
member.summary: Controller for health and capacity monitoring endpoints. Provides information about service status, model state, and current load.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Controllers.HealthController.#ctor(TranscriptionApi.Services.IWhisperModelService,TranscriptionApi.Services.IJobManager,TranscriptionApi.Models.AppConfiguration,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{TranscriptionApi.Controllers.HealthController})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the HealthController.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Controllers.HealthController.GetHealth
member.summary: Health check endpoint. Returns service status, model loaded state, and model size.
member.returns: Health information including model status.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Controllers.HealthController.GetCapacity
member.summary: Capacity check endpoint. Returns current load information including active jobs, queued jobs, and available capacity. Returns 503 Service Unavailable when the service is at capacity.
member.returns: Capacity information including job counts and availability.
member.response: Service is at capacity and cannot accept new jobs.

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Controllers.StreamingTranscriptionController
member.summary: Controller for handling real-time streaming transcription via WebSocket. Accepts binary audio chunks, buffers them, and returns partial/final transcription results.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Controllers.StreamingTranscriptionController.HandleWebSocket
member.summary: WebSocket endpoint for streaming transcription. Accepts binary audio chunks and returns JSON transcription messages.
member.returns: WebSocket connection handling task

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Controllers.StreamingTranscriptionController.ProcessWebSocketConnection(System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket)
member.summary: Processes the WebSocket connection, handling audio chunks and transcription.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Controllers.StreamingTranscriptionController.TranscribeAndSendPartial(System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket,System.Byte[],System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Transcribes audio data and sends a partial result message.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Controllers.StreamingTranscriptionController.TranscribeAndSendFinal(System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket,System.Byte[],System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Transcribes remaining audio data and sends a final result message.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Controllers.StreamingTranscriptionController.SendErrorMessage(System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends an error message over the WebSocket.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Controllers.StreamingTranscriptionController.SendJsonMessage(System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket,TranscriptionApi.Models.StreamingMessage,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends a JSON message over the WebSocket.

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Controllers.TranscriptionController
member.summary: Controller for batch transcription operations. Handles audio file uploads and job status queries.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Controllers.TranscriptionController.SubmitBatchJob(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Submit an audio file for batch transcription. Creates a job and starts background processing.
member.param: The audio file to transcribe (WAV, MP3, OGG, M4A)
member.returns: Job ID and status

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Controllers.TranscriptionController.GetJobStatus(System.String)
member.summary: Get the status and results of a transcription job.
member.returns: Job status and transcription results if available

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Exceptions.FileTooLargeException
member.summary: Exception thrown when an uploaded audio file exceeds the maximum allowed size. Maps to HTTP 413 Payload Too Large.

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Exceptions.InvalidAudioFormatException
member.summary: Exception thrown when an uploaded audio file has an unsupported format. Maps to HTTP 415 Unsupported Media Type.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Exceptions.InvalidAudioFormatException.ForExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an exception with details about the invalid file extension.
member.param: The invalid file extension that was provided

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Exceptions.JobNotFoundException
member.summary: Exception thrown when a requested transcription job ID does not exist. Maps to HTTP 404 Not Found.

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Exceptions.ServiceAtCapacityException
member.summary: Exception thrown when the service cannot accept new transcription jobs due to capacity limits. Maps to HTTP 503 Service Unavailable.

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Middleware.GlobalExceptionHandler
member.summary: Global exception handler that catches unhandled exceptions and formats them into consistent error responses with appropriate HTTP status codes. Implements IExceptionHandler for ASP.NET Core 8.0+ exception handling pipeline.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Middleware.GlobalExceptionHandler.TryHandleAsync(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext,System.Exception,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Attempts to handle the exception by mapping it to an appropriate HTTP response.
member.param: The HTTP context for the current request.
member.returns: True if the exception was handled, false otherwise.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Middleware.GlobalExceptionHandler.MapException(System.Exception)
member.summary: Maps an exception to HTTP status code, error code, message, and optional details.
member.returns: Tuple containing status code, error code, message, and details.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Middleware.GlobalExceptionHandler.LogException(System.Exception,System.Int32,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext)
member.summary: Logs the exception with appropriate context and severity level.
member.param: The HTTP status code being returned.
The HTTP context for additional logging context.

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Middleware.RequestResponseLoggingMiddleware
member.summary: Middleware that logs all HTTP requests and responses with timing information. Provides structured logging with request/response details for monitoring and debugging.

member.summary: Invokes the middleware to log request and response information.
member.param: The HTTP context for the current request.

member.summary: Logs details about the incoming HTTP request.

member.summary: Logs details about the outgoing HTTP response.

member.summary: Determines if a header contains sensitive information that should not be logged.
member.returns: True if the header is sensitive, false otherwise.

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Models.AppConfiguration
member.summary: Application configuration settings for the transcription service. Maps to the "Transcription" section in appsettings.json.

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Models.AppConfiguration.WhisperModelSize
member.summary: Whisper model size to use for transcription. Valid values: tiny, base, small, medium, large. Default: medium

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Models.AppConfiguration.MaxConcurrentWorkers
member.summary: Maximum number of concurrent transcription workers. Controls how many transcription jobs can run simultaneously. Default: 4

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Models.AppConfiguration.MaxQueueSize
member.summary: Maximum number of jobs that can be queued. When this limit is reached, new job submissions will be rejected with 503. Default: 100

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Models.AppConfiguration.MaxFileSizeMB
member.summary: Maximum audio file size in megabytes. Files larger than this will be rejected with 413. Default: 500

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Models.AppConfiguration.JobCleanupMaxAgeHours
member.summary: Maximum age in hours before completed jobs are automatically cleaned up. Default: 24

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Models.AppConfiguration.StreamMinChunkSize
member.summary: Minimum chunk size in bytes for streaming transcription. Audio buffer must reach this size before transcription is triggered. Default: 102400 (100 KB)

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Models.AppConfiguration.StreamMaxBufferSize
member.summary: Maximum buffer size in bytes for streaming transcription. If buffer exceeds this size, an error is returned. Default: 10485760 (10 MB)

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Models.AppConfigurationValidator
member.summary: Validates AppConfiguration settings to ensure they meet requirements. Should be called during application startup to fail fast on invalid configuration.

member.name: F:TranscriptionApi.Models.AppConfigurationValidator.ValidModelSizes
member.summary: List of valid Whisper model sizes.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Models.AppConfigurationValidator.Validate(TranscriptionApi.Models.AppConfiguration)
member.summary: Validates the provided configuration and throws InvalidOperationException if any setting is invalid.
member.exception: Thrown when configuration contains invalid values.

member.summary: Response for job status queries. Provides current status and results of a transcription job.
member.param: Current status: pending, processing, completed, or failed.
The transcribed text. Only present when status is completed.
Error message if the job failed. Only present when status is failed.

member.summary: Response for job status queries. Provides current status and results of a transcription job.

The transcribed text. Only present when status is completed.

member.summary: Unique identifier of the job.

member.summary: Current status: pending, processing, completed, or failed.

member.summary: The transcribed text. Only present when status is completed.

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Models.JobStatusResponse.Error
member.summary: Error message if the job failed. Only present when status is failed.

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Models.JobStatus
member.summary: Represents the status of a transcription job.

member.name: F:TranscriptionApi.Models.JobStatus.Pending
member.summary: Job has been created and is waiting to be processed.

member.name: F:TranscriptionApi.Models.JobStatus.Processing
member.summary: Job is currently being processed.

member.name: F:TranscriptionApi.Models.JobStatus.Completed
member.summary: Job has completed successfully.

member.name: F:TranscriptionApi.Models.JobStatus.Failed
member.summary: Job has failed due to an error.

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Models.TranscriptionJob
member.summary: Represents a transcription job with its current state and results.

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Models.TranscriptionJob.JobId
member.summary: Unique identifier for the job.

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Models.TranscriptionJob.Status
member.summary: Current status of the job.

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Models.TranscriptionJob.Transcription
member.summary: The transcribed text. Only populated when Status is Completed.

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Models.TranscriptionJob.Error
member.summary: Error message if the job failed. Only populated when Status is Failed.

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Models.TranscriptionJob.CreatedAt
member.summary: Timestamp when the job was created.

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Models.TranscriptionJob.CompletedAt
member.summary: Timestamp when the job completed (either successfully or with failure). Null if the job is still pending or processing.

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Services.AudioProcessor
member.summary: Implementation of audio processing service. Handles validation, storage, and conversion of audio files for transcription.

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Services.IAudioProcessor
member.summary: Service for processing and validating audio files. Handles file validation, storage, and conversion to Whisper-compatible format.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.IAudioProcessor.IsValidAudioFile(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile)
member.summary: Validates whether the uploaded file is a supported audio format. Checks file extension, size, and MIME type.
member.returns: True if the file is valid, false otherwise
member.exception: Thrown when file format is not supported
Thrown when file exceeds size limit

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.IAudioProcessor.SaveUploadedFileAsync(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Saves an uploaded audio file to a temporary directory.
member.returns: The full path to the saved file

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.IAudioProcessor.ConvertToWhisperFormatAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Converts an audio file to Whisper-compatible format (16kHz mono WAV). Applies audio normalization during conversion.
member.param: Path to the input audio file
member.returns: Path to the converted audio file

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Services.IJobManager
member.summary: Interface for managing transcription jobs. Provides thread-safe job creation, retrieval, and status updates.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.IJobManager.CreateJob
member.summary: Creates a new transcription job with a unique ID and pending status.
member.returns: The unique job ID for the newly created job.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.IJobManager.GetJob(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a job by its ID.
member.returns: The transcription job if found, null otherwise.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.IJobManager.UpdateJobStatus(System.String,TranscriptionApi.Models.JobStatus,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates the status of a job in a thread-safe manner.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.IJobManager.GetActiveJobCount
member.summary: Gets the count of jobs currently being processed.
member.returns: The number of jobs with Processing status.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.IJobManager.GetQueuedJobCount
member.summary: Gets the count of jobs waiting to be processed.
member.returns: The number of jobs with Pending status.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.IJobManager.IsAtCapacity
member.summary: Checks if the service is at capacity and cannot accept new jobs.
member.returns: True if at capacity, false otherwise.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.IJobManager.StartJobProcessingAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Starts asynchronous processing of a transcription job. Updates job status to Processing, performs transcription, and updates with result or error. Cleans up temporary audio files after processing.
member.param: Path to the uploaded audio file.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Services.ITranscriptionService
member.summary: Service for coordinating audio transcription operations. Manages the transcription workflow including audio processing, worker concurrency, and model invocation.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.ITranscriptionService.TranscribeAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Transcribes an audio file in batch mode. Coordinates audio conversion, worker slot acquisition, and Whisper model transcription.
member.param: Path to the audio file to transcribe
member.returns: The transcribed text

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.ITranscriptionService.TranscribeStreamAsync(System.Byte[],System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Transcribes audio data for streaming mode. Saves audio data to a temporary file, converts it, and transcribes it.
member.returns: The transcribed text

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Services.ITranscriptionService.IsModelLoaded
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the Whisper model is currently loaded.

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Services.ITranscriptionService.ModelSize
member.summary: Gets the configured model size (e.g., "tiny", "base", "small", "medium", "large").

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Services.IWhisperModelService
member.summary: Service for managing and using the Whisper speech recognition model. Handles model loading, lifecycle management, and transcription operations.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.IWhisperModelService.TranscribeAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Transcribes an audio file using the Whisper model. The model must be loaded before calling this method.
member.param: Path to the audio file to transcribe (must be in Whisper format: 16kHz mono WAV)
member.returns: The transcribed text
member.exception: Thrown when model is not loaded

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.IWhisperModelService.LoadModelAsync
member.summary: Loads the Whisper model into memory. This operation is thread-safe and will only load the model once. Subsequent calls will return immediately if the model is already loaded.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous load operation

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Services.IWhisperModelService.IsLoaded
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the Whisper model is currently loaded.

member.name: P:TranscriptionApi.Services.IWhisperModelService.ModelSize
member.summary: Gets the configured model size (e.g., "tiny", "base", "small", "medium", "large").

member.name: T:TranscriptionApi.Services.JobManager
member.summary: Manages transcription jobs with thread-safe operations. Uses ConcurrentDictionary for thread-safe job storage. Implements IDisposable to properly clean up the cleanup timer.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.JobManager.#ctor(TranscriptionApi.Models.AppConfiguration,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{TranscriptionApi.Services.JobManager},System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the JobManager class.
member.param: Service provider for resolving scoped services.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.JobManager.CleanupOldJobs(System.Object)
member.summary: Cleanup callback that removes jobs older than the configured maximum age. This method is called periodically by the cleanup timer.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.JobManager.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the JobManager and releases resources.

member.name: M:TranscriptionApi.Services.JobManager.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Protected implementation of Dispose pattern.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TranscriptionService class.
